Package ev3dev.sensors

Class Battery

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevDevice
      • ev3dev.sensors.Battery

  • public class Battery
extends EV3DevDevice
    The class Battery interacts with EV3Dev to get information about battery used.
    See Also:
    https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/power/power_supply_class.txt, https://github.com/ev3dev/ev3dev-lang/blob/develop/wrapper-specification.md#direct-attribute-mappings-5
